chapters.title: Chapter 14: A Vow
chapters.info: Talva, p. 213—Thin Aes Sedai of the Yellow Ajah. She wears her golden hair in a bun. She is secretly (until Verin's revelation, at least) of the Black Ajah. She fled the Tower after the Seanchan raid. She later attacked Egwene in Tel'aran'rhiod, and was burned to death by Alviarin's errant fireball. See also Freidhen, Alviarin.
